L

left - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition
The top and left position of the level entry.
Level - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level
Holds the loaded level image (Level.bitmap) which is intended to be drawn, a LevelInfo object (Level.levelInfo) and an array of collectables (Level.collectables) which are read from the collision image (LevelInfo.collisionResource).
Level(Context, LevelInfo) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.Level
Loads the level image and the collision image according to Level.levelInfo and the collectable graphic.
LEVEL_COUNT - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView
The number of levels.
levelInfo - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.GameSurfaceView
Current level info.
levelInfo - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.Level
 
LevelInfo - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level
Holds general information about a level like the number, a score object and a pointer to the level image and collision image.
LevelInfo(int, Highscores.Score, int, int) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.LevelInfo
Constructs a LevelInfo object with the given parameters.
LevelInfoPosition(int, float, float) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition
 
levelInfoPositions - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView
Contains a LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition object for each level.
levelMatrix - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.GameSurfaceView
Transformation of the level on the screen.
levels - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView
Contains a LevelInfo object for each level.
LevelSelectionActivity - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight
Fullscreen activity for level selection.
LevelSelectionActivity() - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionActivity
 
LevelSelectionSurfaceView - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight
Draws the level selection screen.
LevelSelectionSurfaceView(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView
Creates a surface view.
LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight
Holds the LevelSelectionSurfaceView.LevelInfoPosition.number of the Level and the top and left position of the level entry.
lives - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.Player
Number of lives the player has left.
loadLevels() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionSurfaceView
Iterates through the image resources levelx and levelxcollision, where x is LevelInfo.number - 1, queries the score (best time and highscore) from the database and adds a LevelInfo object containing these variables for each level to the levels list LevelSelectionSurfaceView.levels.
logo - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.MenuSurfaceView
The logo graphic.
